summary: Teaches the move Shadow Claw, a 70-power Ghost-type physical attack with a high critical-hit ratio.
typical_users: Physical Ghost-type attackers (e.g., Gengar, Chandelure, Mimikyu)
Pokémon needing Ghost-type coverage (e.g., Garchomp, Dragonite)
Pokémon benefiting from high critical-hit chance
